name: Friendly F.I.R.E.
description:
Welcome to Friendly F.I.R.E., a fast-paced arcade shooter where your worst enemy is yourself. Battle against waves of foes as two separate characters whilst dodging a bullet-hell of your own creation. Controller required to play.

Controls:

  • Move Left Character: Left Stick
  • Move Right Character: Right Stick
  • Fire Left Character Weapon: Left Bumper/L1
  • Fire Right Character Weapon: Right Bumper/R1

Dev Team:

Jacob Goodheart

Joe Phillabaum

Matt Skelly

Big thanks to Kenney.nl for the sound effects and fonts!
